## zelos.ConstantProvider.(constructor)

Creates a new ConstantProvider.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(gridUnit?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  gridUnit | number | _(Optional)_ If set, defines the base unit used to calculate other constants. |
